00011     ParallelWorldMessenger::ParallelWorldMessenger(RunManager* runManager) :
00012    runManager_(runManager) {
00013         
00014         pwDir_->SetGuidance("UI commands specific to parallel worlds.");
00015         
00016         enablePWCmd_->SetGuidance("Enable the use of a parallel world.");
00017         enablePWCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit);
00018         
00019         readCmd_->SetGuidance("The GDML file containing the description of the parallel world.");
00020         readCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit); 
00021     }

00029     void ParallelWorldMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) { 
00030         
00031         if (command == enablePWCmd_) runManager_->enableParallelWorld(true);
00032         else if (command == readCmd_) runManager_->setParallelWorldPath(newValues); 
00033     }
